products.name: Smart TV
products.description: Enjoy high-definition clarity with this smart TV. Perfect for streaming movies and shows.

reviews.comment: Great TV, excellent picture quality!
Good value for the price.

products.name: Smartphone
products.description: Stay connected with this powerful smartphone. Features include a high-resolution camera and long-lasting battery.

reviews.comment: Excellent phone, fast performance.
Decent phone, but battery life could be better.

products.name: Gaming Console
products.description: Immerse yourself in the world of gaming with this advanced gaming console. Supports the latest games and features.

reviews.comment: Awesome console, graphics are top-notch!
Great gaming experience overall.

products.name: Refrigerator
products.description: Keep your food fresh and organized with this spacious refrigerator. Energy-efficient design.

reviews.comment: Good refrigerator, plenty of storage space.
Average performance, but meets basic needs.

products.name: Headphones
products.description: Enjoy immersive audio with these comfortable and stylish headphones. Perfect for music lovers.

reviews.comment: Excellent sound quality, comfortable to wear.
Good value for money, sound could be more balanced.

products.name: Laptop
products.description: Powerful laptop with high-resolution display and fast processing speed. Ideal for work and play.

reviews.comment: Great laptop, very fast and reliable.
Good performance, but a bit expensive.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.description: Stay connected on the go with this stylish smartwatch. Tracks fitness and health metrics.

reviews.comment: Nice watch, good features.
Decent watch, but the battery life is short.

products.name: Tablet
products.description: Portable and powerful tablet with a high-resolution display. Perfect for entertainment and productivity.

reviews.comment: Excellent tablet, very versatile.
Good tablet, but could use more storage.

products.name: Digital Camera
products.description: Capture stunning photos with this high-resolution digital camera. Features advanced settings and modes.

reviews.comment: Amazing camera, very high quality.
Great camera, but a bit pricey.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with excellent sound quality. Perfect for parties and outdoor activities.

reviews.comment: Great sound, very portable.
Good speaker, but the battery life could be better.

products.name: Microwave Oven
products.description: Quick and easy cooking with this high-power microwave oven. Features multiple settings and timer.

reviews.comment: Very convenient and easy to use.
Good microwave, but a bit noisy.

products.name: Smart Thermostat
products.description: Control your home temperature with this smart thermostat. Energy-efficient and easy to use.

reviews.comment: Great device, very user-friendly.
Good thermostat, but a bit expensive.

products.name: Air Purifier
products.description: Keep your indoor air clean and fresh with this air purifier. Features multiple filter settings.

reviews.comment: Very effective, good for allergies.
Works well, but a bit noisy.

products.name: Electric Kettle
products.description: Boil water quickly and efficiently with this electric kettle. Features auto shut-off and temperature control.

reviews.comment: Heats up quickly, very convenient.
Good kettle, but could be more durable.
